attributes.action: Irradiate the £1,457bn of UK debt by insisting everyone makes a one-off goodwill payment of £20.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ok, so the country is riddled with a ‘mountain of debt’ and there is much talk of ruthless cuts to public spending being necessary, which may mean the unemployment figure will rise, and it will take many years to get over the credit crunch. The talk is very confusing, and to me pretty silly. There is much fretting over the little and many cuts that have to be made over countless years. 
Why don’t the government just ask for a one-off payment of say £20 from everyone and have done with it. No slow laborious upheaval and restoration of the country, just a sensible, straight to the point answer’
So chip in £20 to clean up the mess – disaster averted!
